mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKING_PARTY VALUES( SEQ_WORKING_PARTY_NO.NEXTVAL,#{writer_id},#{pathOne},#{pathAll, typeHandler = WalkingTypeHandler},#{contant}, DEFAULT,#{start_date}, #{start_time},#{estimated_time},#{distance}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT wp.*,m.nick_name nick_name , m.profile_re_name profile FROM WORKING_PARTY wp JOIN MEMBER m ON writer_id = id WHERE nick_name LIKE (#{id}) AND (STAT = '모집중') ORDER BY start_time
SELECT * FROM WORKING_PARTY WHERE writer_id = #{id} AND (STAT = '모집중') ORDER BY START_DATE, START_TIME, STAT

SELECT * FROM WORKING_PARTY wp JOIN walking_request req ON wp.party_no = req.party_no WHERE req.request_id = #{id} AND (wp.STAT = '모집중') AND ((req.REQ_STAT = '수락') OR (req.REQ_STAT = '확인 필요')) ORDER BY START_DATE, START_TIME

SELECT wp.*,m.nick_name nick_name , m.profile_re_name profile , s.avg avg FROM WORKING_PARTY wp JOIN MEMBER m ON writer_id = id JOIN (SELECT recive_id, avg(score) avg from score group by recive_id) s ON writer_id = s.recive_id WHERE (START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date}) AND TO_DATE(#{date})+ 0.99999) AND m.nick_name LIKE (#{id}) AND (STAT = '모집중') ORDER BY start_time
SELECT wr.*, m.nick_name NICK_NAME, m.profile_re_name profile FROM walking_request wr JOIN MEMBER m ON wr.REQUEST_ID = m.ID WHERE PARTY_NO = #{party_no} AND wr.REQ_STAT = '확인 필요'
SELECT count(*) FROM walking_request wr JOIN MEMBER m ON wr.REQUEST_ID = m.ID WHERE PARTY_NO = #{party_no} AND wr.REQ_STAT = '확인 필요'

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.nick_name NICK_NAME, m.profile_re_name profile, m.open_profile_url kakao FROM walking_request wr JOIN MEMBER m ON wr.REQUEST_ID = m.ID WHERE wr.REQ_STAT = '수락' AND wr.response_id = #{myId}
